metadata.title: CVE-2018-17974 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Tcpreplay 4.3.0 beta1. A heap-based bufferover-read was triggered in the function dlt_en10mb_encode() of the fileplugins/dlt_en10mb/en10mb.c, due to inappropriate values in the functionmemmove(). The length (pktlen + ctx -> l2len) can be larger than sourcevalue (packet + ctx->l2len) because the function fails to ensure the lengthof a packet is valid. This leads to Denial of Service.

criterions.comment: tcpreplay: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
